text: In the ECS Inspector - Reprocessing Groups page, under the Actions column, click on the Delete (trash icon) button. A dialog will appear requesting you to confirm your decision. Click the Delete button to delete the reprocessing group. A success message will appear, indicating that the reprocessing group has been successfully deleted. Deleted reprocessing group will be removed from the reprocessing group table. Warning! A deleted reprocessing group cannot be recovered.
title: ECS - Deleting a Reprocessing Group - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
